test and the sufficient condition test cannot be used to rule out conflicting
interpretations of the precedents.
When the actual precedents are not enough, judges sometimes refer to hy-
pothetical cases.In Plessy,a judge might imagine a law with discriminatory
effect  but  no  discriminatory  motive.  If  the  judge  can  show  why  this  law
